1980's style 'Pong' based game I created that has Hillary and Bernie bat a donkey around back and forth to score points

What do you get when you cross a lifetime's passion for music, a lush professional background and unparalleled web development training?
If your answer is this guy in a nutshell, well...call me a legume.
At heart, I love to create and collaborate. Heroes of mine range from Neil deGrasse Tyson to Tim Ferriss, with the common thread being my fascination with how passion combines with innovation and optimization. My fascination grew so huge that I couldn't sit on the sidelines anymore - I had to throw my hat in the ring.

Can't Be Both

Lullaby For Loved Ones

I've been playing music since I was 6. I'm a composer, multi-instrumentalist and singer with a voice often described as being akin to Tom Waits. My love of creating music can be described as both my sanity and my madness, and my passion for performing extends not only to stages around the world, but also to organizations like Musicians On Call, which allows me the opportunity to cheer up children stuck in hospitals.

My instruments: guitar, piano, banjo, harmonica, ukulele, bass, congas, bongos, ceiling fan
